author: Jonathan Cheng
title: Olympics Closing Ceremony Will Be Chance for Ivanka Trump, North Koreans to Meet
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—The crowd at Sunday’s Closing Ceremony of the Olympics will include both a high-level North Korean delegation and U.S. presidential adviser Ivanka Trump, setting up another potential encounter between the two adversaries.

Kim Yong Chol, vice chairman of the Central Committee of North Korea’s ruling Workers’ Party, will arrive in the South on Sunday for a three-day stay, South Korea’s Ministry of Unification said Thursday. The Seoul government said that it approved the visit to further its goals of improving...
